description: Edit existing Mobile Profile using name or uid.

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Send JSON object to use the API Web Services

headers.name: X-chkp-sid
headers.description: Session unique identifier as it returned by the login request

body.name: uid
body.description: Object unique identifier.

body.name: new-name
body.description: New name of the object.

body.name: enable-print-mails
body.description: Allow to print mails.

body.name: max-attachments-size
body.description: Maximum size of attachments allowed for downloading - you can choose a unit (gbs, kbs, mbs, bytes) in "max-attachments-unit" field.

body.name: calendar-from-the-last
body.description: How far back to see your Calendar from the current date - you can choose a unit (day, week, month) in "calendar-from-the-last-unit" field.

body.name: calendar-from-the-last-unit
body.description: Unit for "calendar-from-the-last" numeric value.

body.name: calendar-to-the-following
body.description: How much ahead to see your Calendar from the current date - you can choose a unit (day, week, month) in "calendar-to-the-following-unit" field.

body.name: calendar-to-the-following-unit
body.description: Unit for "calendar-to-the-following" numeric value.

body.name: mail-from-the-last
body.description: How far back to see your emails from the current date - choose a unit (day, week, month) in "mail-from-the-last-unit" field.

body.name: mail-from-the-last-unit
body.description: Unit for "mail-from-the-last" numeric value.

body.name: synchronize-contacts
body.description: Contacts synchronization method - from the mail server to device and the app and vice versa or from the mail server to device and the app or from the mail server to the app.
valid_values: mail srv to app and device and vice versa
mail srv to app and device

body.name: allow-push-notification
body.description: Allow to receive push notifications of mails and meetings.

body.name: allow-calendar-sync
body.description: Allow synchronization between business calendar to device calendar.

body.name: allow-contacts-from-global-address-list
body.description: Allow to add additional contacts from Global Address List to the app.

body.name: allow-contacts-from-local-phone
body.description: Allow to add additional contacts from local phone to the app.

body.name: save-local-web-cache
body.description: Configure whether local cache data generated by web browser should be preserved.

body.name: allow-caching-docsec-credentials
body.description: Allow store encrypted document credentials in application secure storage.

body.name: allow-caching-docsec-keys
body.description: Allow store encrypted document keys in application secure storage.

body.name: app-theme-color-dark
body.description: Configure the application display colors in Dark mode. 6 hex digits that define RGB color - relevant for IOS.

body.name: app-theme-color-light
body.description: Configure the application display colors in light mode. 6 hex digits that define RGB color - relevant for IOS.

body.name: allow-calendar
body.description: Allow sync business calendar to device calendar.

body.name: allow-contacts
body.description: Enable/Disable contacts app.

body.name: allow-mail
body.description: Enable/Disable email app.

body.name: allow-notes-sync
body.description: Allow sync business notes to device notes.

body.name: allow-saved-file-apps
body.description: Allow the appearance of 'Saved file app' in the app list.

body.name: allow-secure-chat
body.description: Enable/Disable Messages app (depends on Mail app).

body.name: allow-tasks
body.description: Enable/Disable Tasks app.

body.name: certificate-expire-message
body.description: message to show users when certificate is expired - for admin to fill - can contain only English characters, digits, comma, spaces and points.

body.name: add
body.description: Adds to collection of values

body.name: remove
body.description: Removes from collection of values

body.name: add
body.description: Adds to collection of values

body.name: remove
body.description: Removes from collection of values

body.name: add
body.description: Adds to collection of values

body.name: remove
body.description: Removes from collection of values

body.name: allow-copy-paste
body.description: Allow copy paste of mail content.

body.name: block-forward-attachments
body.description: Allow share mail attachments with external mails.

body.name: block-screenshot
body.description: If true - you can't make a screenshot from your app.

body.name: allowed-domains-forward-attachment
body.description: exclusion of domains which attachments are allowed to be sent, even that shared policy prevents sharing these kinds of attached files - can contain only English characters, digits, comma, spaces and points.

body.name: add
body.description: Adds to collection of values

body.name: remove
body.description: Removes from collection of values

body.name: add
body.description: Adds to collection of values

body.name: remove
body.description: Removes from collection of values

body.name: allow-import-from-gallery
body.description: Allow import media from gallery.

body.name: allow-taking-photos-and-videos
body.description: Allow the camera to be used from your app.

body.name: offer-capsule-as-viewer
body.description: Offer Capsule as a viewer for external protected documents.

body.name: protect-policy-enabled
body.description: Enable/disable Protect Application- cannot be enable if Harmony SDK is enable.

body.name: protect-high-risk-action
body.description: What is the action if there is high risk found by Harmony Mobile.

body.name: protect-high-risk-message
body.description: The message can contain only English characters, digits, comma, spaces and points.

body.name: protect-medium-risk-action
body.description: What is the action if there is medium risk found by Harmony Mobile.

body.name: protect-medium-risk-message
body.description: The message can contain only English characters, digits, comma, spaces and points.

body.name: protect-not-activated-action
body.description: What is the action if there is policy violation (configuration for Harmony Mobile).

body.name: protect-not-activated-message
body.description: The message can contain only English characters, digits, comma, spaces and points.

body.name: enable-harmony-mobile-sdk
body.description: Enable/disable Harmony SDK - cannot be enable if Harmony Mobile Application is enable.

body.name: compromised-behavior
body.description: Device configuration - response to malicious behavior (configuration for Harmony SDK).

body.name: harmony-mobile-sdk-license
body.description: License for Harmony Mobile Sdk (configuration for Harmony SDK) - can contain only English characters, digits, comma, spaces and point.

body.name: malware-behavior
body.description: Behavior when App is identified as malicious (configuration for Harmony SDK).

body.name: man-in-the-middle-attack
body.description: Behavior when there is a network man-in-the-middle attack (configuration for Harmony SDK).

body.name: os-integrity-compromised
body.description: Behavior when Device OS is compromised (configuration for Harmony SDK).

body.name: suspicious-app
body.description: Behavior when App is suspected as malicious (configuration for Harmony SDK).

body.name: suspicious-enterprise-certificate
body.description: Behavior when a certificate profile has been installed allowing the installing of apps on device from unknown source - iOS only (configuration for Harmony SDK).

body.name: session-timeout
body.description: Session timeout - you can choose a unit (day, week, month) in "session-timeout-unit" field.

body.name: session-timeout-unit
body.description: Unit for "session-timeout" numeric value.

body.name: activate-passcode-lock
body.description: Require passcode to the application.

body.name: allow-store-credentials
body.description: Allow storing the credentials on the device.

body.name: passcode-profile
body.description: Passcode Policy object identified by the name or UID.

body.name: report-jailbroken
body.description: Issue log when device is detected as jail broken.

body.name: block-jailbroken
body.description: Action upon detection of jail broken devices.

body.name: block-3rd-party-keyboard
body.description: Block 3rd party keyboard.

body.name: hide-ssl-connect-anyway-button
body.description: Hide connect button on critical SSL trust failures.
